alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:33PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cullman County through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking redeveloping thunderstorms near Good Hope. These storms were nearly stationary. These storms have produced between 1 and 3 inches of rainfall over that area and additional heavy rainfall could cause significant ponding of water over roadways in those areas. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Dodge City, and Phelan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
